trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CustomizeLegendEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: Klassen CustomizeLegendEventArgs brukes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: There are only two properties in this class.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes bare to egenskaper i denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>egenskapen kan du slette eller endre både standardregler og egendefinerte elementer for forklaring, og legge til egendefinerte elementer for forklaring.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan også brukes til å endre rekkefølgen på forklaringselementene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>egenskapen brukes til å identifisere forklaringen som var årsaken til denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> and legend name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> og forklaringsnavnet på.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The legend name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på forklaringen.

trans-unit.source: Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Brukes til å fjerne, endre eller endre rekkefølgen på begge egendefinert og standard forklaringselementene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Kan også brukes til å legge til egendefinerte elementer for forklaring.

trans-unit.source: The LegendItems property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LegendItems gjør det mulig å slette eller endre både standardregler og egendefinerte elementer for forklaring i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>hendelse, og legge til egendefinerte elementer for forklaring.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: The order of legend items can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: Også du kan endre rekkefølgen for forklaringselementene.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>og [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) egenskaper som kan brukes til å fastsette dataelementet som er knyttet til et standard forklaringselement.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.
trans-unit.target: Disse egenskapene tilbakestiller tomme strenger for egendefinert forklaringstekst elementer fordi egendefinerte elementer ikke er knyttet til diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual [Legend](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du bestemme som <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>hendelsen oppstod for, slik at du kan tilpasse en individuell [forklaring](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objektet, som kan brukes til å finne ut hvilken forklaring ble avsenderen av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> objektet.
